attributes.action: ask the DTi to act on the levying of excessive delivery charges by businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is common practice for businesses selling on-line to inflate the published price of goods by introducing a disporportionate delivery charge on check-out, which is invariably significantly in excess of the real cost of postage.  The Prime Minister is therefore petitioned to ask the DTi to prepare a statutory instrument to update the Trade Descriptions Act and so protect the consumer against this type of misdescription of goods.
